The Russell 2000 is down ~4% today. 

This is why stocks are risky and should be avoided at all costs.

next.excerpt: Porter is a platform that makes AWS/GCP as easy to use as Heroku. With instant deploys from Git, built-in autoscaling, and automatic SSL, Porter gives you the convenience of a PaaS while preserving flexibility and control.
next.title: Porter - Heroku that runs in your own cloud
